us.conxio.HL7.HL7Stream
Class HL7StreamBase

java.lang.Object
  us.conxio.HL7.HL7Stream.HL7StreamBase
All Implemented Interfaces:
HL7MessageHandler, HL7Stream
Direct Known Subclasses:
HL7FileReader, HL7FileWriter, HL7SocketStream
public abstract class HL7StreamBase
extends java.lang.Object
implements HL7Stream, HL7MessageHandler

A base class of default behaviors for HL7Stream objects.
